name: Lenny's Indian Head Inn
description: Classic seafood shack on the water with fresh lobster rolls and fried clams. A Connecticut shoreline institution since 1927.

name: Le Petit Cafe
description: Upscale dining with creative American cuisine in an elegant setting. Known for exceptional service and seasonal menus.

name: Donovan's Reef
description: Waterfront dining with beautiful views of the Branford River. Fresh seafood and classic American dishes.

name: Parthenon Diner
description: Classic Connecticut diner serving breakfast all day, plus Greek specialties and comfort food favorites.

name: The Place
description: Iconic outdoor seafood spot where everything is cooked over an open fire. BYOB, cash only, and totally unique.

name: Guilford Bistro & Bar
description: Farm-to-table American cuisine in the heart of Guilford's historic town green. Craft cocktails and local ingredients.

name: Stone House
description: Historic restaurant dating back to 1840 serving refined New England seafood with waterfront views.

name: Quattro's Italian Restaurant
description: Family-owned Italian restaurant with homemade pasta, brick oven pizza, and traditional recipes.

name: Donahue's Madison Beach Grille
description: Popular spot for fresh seafood and waterfront dining. Known for lobster rolls and sunset views.

name: Cafe Allegre
description: Refined Italian cuisine with an extensive wine list. Perfect for special occasions and date nights.

name: Lenny & Joe's Fish Tale
description: Family-friendly seafood restaurant with a carousel. Famous for whole belly clams and homemade ice cream.

name: RJ Julia Cafe
description: Cozy cafe inside the famous RJ Julia bookstore. Light fare, coffee, and pastries in a literary setting.

name: Chamard Vineyards Bistro
description: Farm-to-table dining at a beautiful Connecticut vineyard. Wine pairings and seasonal New England cuisine.

name: Lobster Landing
description: No-frills BYOB spot right on the water. Hot butter lobster rolls that locals rave about. Cash only.

name: Chips Pub
description: Local pub favorite with great burgers, wings, and cold beer. Friendly atmosphere and live music weekends.

name: Westbrook Lobster
description: Classic seafood market and restaurant. Fresh catches daily, lobster dinners, and raw bar.

name: Bill's Seafood Restaurant
description: Landmark waterfront restaurant since 1950. Outdoor dining, live music, and classic New England seafood.

name: Edd's Place
description: Beloved breakfast spot with hearty portions. Famous pancakes and friendly service since 1976.

name: Liv's Oyster Bar
description: Upscale raw bar and seafood restaurant. Creative cocktails and impeccable oyster selection.

name: Penny Lane Pub
description: British-style pub with excellent fish and chips, shepherd's pie, and a great selection of beers.

name: Fresh Salt
description: Waterfront fine dining at the Saybrook Point Resort. Panoramic views and contemporary American cuisine.

name: Pizzetta
address: 891 Boston Post Rd, Old Saybrook, CT 06475
description: Artisan wood-fired pizzas with creative toppings. Local favorite for casual Italian dining.

name: Chow
description: Pan-Asian cuisine with sushi, Thai, and Chinese favorites. Modern atmosphere and fresh ingredients.

name: Sandpiper Restaurant
address: 144 Cosey Beach Ave, East Haven, CT 06512
description: Beach neighborhood favorite with waterfront views. Classic American fare and seafood specials.

name: Amarante's Sea Cliff
description: Elegant waterfront Italian dining with stunning Long Island Sound views. Perfect for special occasions.

name: Ristorante Amalfi
description: Authentic Southern Italian cuisine in a charming setting. Homemade pastas and family recipes.

name: Su Casa
description: Authentic Mexican cuisine with house-made salsas and margaritas. Colorful atmosphere and friendly service.

name: India Palace
description: Traditional Indian cuisine with an extensive menu. Known for their lunch buffet and authentic flavors.

name: Shoreline Prime
description: Upscale steakhouse and seafood restaurant. Prime cuts, fresh seafood, and an impressive wine list.

name: Stony Creek Market
description: Charming village market and cafe near Stony Creek. Great sandwiches, coffee, and local goods.
